Name: X-linked sideroblastic anemia with ataxia
Definition: A sideroblastic anemia that is characterized by decreased production of hemoglobin and ataxia and has_material_basis_in the mutation in the ABCB7 gene.

Name: obsolete infantile onset spinocerebellar ataxia
Definition: An autosomal recessive cerebellar ataxia that is characterized by progressive ataxia

Name: sideroblastic anemia 1
Definition: A sideoblastic anemia that is characterized by the presence of microcytic hypochromic anemia and iron overload

Name: obsolete sideroblastic anemia with spinocerebellar ataxia
Definition: A sideoblastic anemia that is characterized by microcytic hypochromic anemia and ealy-onset

Name: autosomal recessive pyridoxine-refractory sideroblastic anemia 2
Definition: A sideroblastic anemia that is characterized by microcytic hypochromic anemia and iron overload

Name: pyridoxine-responsive sideroblastic anemia
Definition: A sideoblastic anemia that is characterized by the presence of microcytic hypochromic anemia and iron overload

Name: autosomal dominant sideroblastic anemia 4
Definition: A sideroblastic anemia characterized by an autosomal dominant inheritance pattern.

Name: sideroblastic anemia with B-cell immunodeficiency
Definition: A sideroblastic anemia characterized by onset of severe sideroblastic anemia in the neonatal period or infancy

Name: autosomal recessive pyridoxine-refractory sideroblastic anemia 3
Definition: A sideroblastic anemia that is characterized by homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the GLRX5 gene on chromosome 14q32.
